All Classes

Class Description
Admin
Can do what a Customer can do, but is able to see information about all Scooter and sending them to the local repair facility
Area
The class Area defines a area where the scooters can be used, each area consist of four coordinates
Coordinate
The class coordinate consists of two attributes, ndegrees and edegrees.
Customer
The class Customer is allowed to check the account balance and drive a scotter if account balance is sufficient
Haversine  
MaintenanceDepartment
The class MaintenanceDepartment stores damaged scooters and repairs them
NotEnoughCreditsException
When a Customer has not enough credits to rent a Scooter, this exception is thrown
NotLoggedInException
If a user tries to do sth without being logged in, this exception is thrown
Scooter
The scooter class can be used by a customer as a vehicle until the battery is empty, the customer pays a fixed price for every minute of travel.
ScooterHotspot
there are several ScooterHotspots in one area, each hotspot has a name and a limited capacity for scooters, a ScooterHunter can replace empty scooters with reloaded ones
ScooterHunter
Can do what a Customer can do, but is able to see Scooters with low battery and recharge them to top up the account balance
Status
The enum Status consists of the types: ready, lowonbattery, inuse, charging, damaged, maintenance.
